Expect posts#index to assign Post.all to @posts

Update file spec/controllers/posts_controller_spec.rb

Add 

 
     it "assigns @posts to Post.all" do
       get :index
       expect(assigns[:posts]).to eq Post.all
     end

Becomes 

       get :index
       expect(response).to be_success
     end
 
     it "assigns @posts to Post.all" do
       get :index
       expect(assigns[:posts]).to eq Post.all
     end
   end
 end
